segments.text: Good evening , sir . What's your pleasure this evening ? Your usual ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'm going to stay with the same , a beer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , a beer . Here you are , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , darn . Look what I've done . ( Spill the drink )
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . I'll make you another on the house .
segments.speaker: S1
